html:
2025-0596
2025-07-30TCCanada Shipping Act, 2001Regulations Amending the Vessel Operation Restriction Regulations Regulations Amending the Vessel Operation Restriction Regulations in order to (1) repeal the eight schedules of the Vessel Operation Restriction Regulations to allow Transport Canada to use new powers to streamline vessel operating restrictions by authorizing incorporation by reference and allowing the Minister of Transport to designate enforcement officers; (2) repeal section 16 of the Regulations; and (3) make administrative corrections to ensure clarity and certainty about the restrictions.Registration: SOR/2025-158 Publication Date: 2025-08-13
subject: Regulations Amending the Vessel Operation Restriction Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the Vessel Operation Restriction Regulations in order to (1) repeal the eight schedules of the Vessel Operation Restriction Regulations to allow Transport Canada to use new powers to streamline vessel operating restrictions by authorizing incorporation by reference and allowing the Minister of Transport to designate enforcement officers; (2) repeal section 16 of the Regulations; and (3) make administrative corrections to ensure clarity and certainty about the restrictions.
